com.opengamma.strata.function.fx

Class AbstractFxForwardFunction<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opengamma.strata.function.fx.AbstractFxForwardFunction<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the return type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CalculationFunction<FxTrade>, CalculationSingleFunction<FxTrade,ScenarioResult<T>>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FxForwardBucketedPv01Function, FxForwardCurrencyExposureFunction, FxForwardFutureFxRateFunction, FxForwardParSpreadFunction, FxForwardPv01Function, FxForwardPvFunction

    public abstract class AbstractFxForwardFunction<T>
extends Object
implements CalculationSingleFunction<FxTrade,ScenarioResult<T>>
    Calculates a result for an FxTrade for each of a set of scenarios.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected AbstractFxForwardFunction()
      Creates a new instance which will return results from the execute method that support automatic currency conversion if the underlying results support it.
      protected AbstractFxForwardFunction(boolean convertCurrencies)
      Creates a new instance.

      • execute

        public ScenarioResult<T> execute(FxTrade trade,
                                 CalculationMarketData marketData)
        Description copied from interface: CalculationSingleFunction
        Calculates a value for the target using multiple sets of market data.

        If the calculated value contains any currency amounts and implements CurrencyConvertible the calculation engine will automatically convert the amounts into the reporting currency.

        Specified by:
        execute in interface CalculationSingleFunction<FxTrade,ScenarioResult<T>>
        Parameters:
        trade - the target of the calculation
        marketData - the market data used in the calculation
        Returns:
        the result of the calculation
